resources.string: I am Reco and welcome to our review community of cosmetic products
Scan the ingredient list of your cosmetic product and get their details

We can help you to : 
- Get ingredient details of your products by scanning its bottles 
- Analyse if a product feet your skin type 
- Propose you products that may interest you 
_ Free access to our review community
Don\'t forget to share about your reviews of product to get our community bigger !!
